game_description: Experience an intense and immersive dive into the watery underworld of pirate bartending! Build out your tavern, raise your fortunes, strengthen your firepower! Lest we forget -- greed in this world can never be sated. Down here, new management means nothing to those still collecting on the debt of your infamous, tomb-sunken father! The dreaded Debt Collector is coming. Will you be prepared?
review_1: Coffin Rot Brewing Co is a fun bartending game serving drinks to ghosts while shooting skeletons who try to steal your gold. I found it to be a polished title despite being somewhat limited in gameplay and options. Its all about going fast serving drinks and if you have time washing them to get extra combo points. Check out my video for my full thoughts where I give the game an 8 out of 10. Video - https://youtu.be/HTEiPg3Q_e8
review_2: You can see it included as in my Top 10 App Lab games video series here: https://youtu.be/0YXaguvpL9Y Make money by serving drinks to an undead pirate crew whilst warding off skeletons who want to plunder your hard earned stash. A challenging arcade shooter with plenty of unlockables to keep things fresh.
